players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I am the detective and I found out Charlie is the mafioso."
Diana: "I have identified Charlie as the mafioso. We need to work together to ensure he is eliminated before he can eliminate us."
You: "I'm not sure if I believe Diana, but I will keep an eye on Charlie. Let's all work together to figure out what's going on."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
